sentences.sContent: He plays the violin in an orchestra.
sentences.sContent_eng: He plays the violin in an orchestra.
sentences.sCn: 他在管弦乐队中演奏小提琴。

sentences.sContent: She is first violin of an orchestra .
sentences.sContent_eng: She is first violin of an orchestra .
sentences.sCn: 她是管弦乐队的第一小提琴手。

sentences.sContent: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.sContent_eng: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.sCn: 所有这些都来自于小提琴和大提琴的演奏。

phrases.pCn: 小提琴协奏曲；小提琴协奏曲选

words.tran: 小提琴演奏者，小提琴家

trans.tranOther: a small wooden musical instrument that you hold under your chin and play by pulling a bow(= special stick ) across the strings
